name: Swarm of Fire Dancers
description: A swarm of chaotic elemental creatures embodying fire, glowing with bright light in a 30-foot radius and capable of transforming into a terrifying blue humanoid skull.
memorable: They cause ongoing fire damage and can impose fear through their frightening visage.
goals: To swarm and damage opponents while sowing fear.
relations: Typically found alone or in hostile elemental environments; may be summoned by fire-oriented creatures.
environment: Usually inhabits fiery locations or areas associated with elemental chaos.
strengths: Immunity to fire and poison damage, along with several condition immunities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage and susceptible to water effects.
attacks: Employs Singe attacks for fire damage and can frighten enemies with Frightening Visage.
most_powerful_ability: Frightening Visage can instill fear in nearby humanoids, disrupting enemy formations.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and communication in Ignan, the language of fire elementals.
additional_information: Elemental nature allows it to exist without air, food, or sleep.
Can occupy the same space as other creatures, enhancing its swarming capabilities.
Fire damage from contact and close proximity increases ongoing damage potential.
Imposes a fear effect to disrupt enemy tactics.
Resistant to various physical damage types.
test_queries: swarm of fiery dancers that cause fear
medium elemental swarm with fire damage
fire elemental that occupies creature spaces
